Title: Behold... The Vision
Writer: Michael Ryan, Michael Ryan (story), Jack Kirby (comic book), Joe Simon (comic book), Christopher Yost (story), Joshua Fine (story)
Actors: Kari Wahlgren, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Rick D. Wasserman, Chris Cox
Plot: Captain America and friends travel to Wakanda to repair his shield, unaware that a powerful android is hunting them to capture it among other objectives.
